title: Identifying Magic Indexes in Arrays
description: In computer science, a magic index (also known as a fixed point) of an array is an index i in the array such that its value is equal to i. In other words, the task is to find an element in the array such that its value is equal to its index.

meta.description: Discover how to find the magic index in a sorted array with possible duplicates using Python. Learn this fundamental computer science concept and its practical applications.
